Text: This version of PowerISO automatically installs AVG toolbar for your browser with no way to opt out. Hate that crap. You can uninstall it pretty easily but it's still annoying. I went back to PowerISO 4.9 which doesn't install any toolbar crap.

I take that back. It is NOT easy to uninstall. After removing it from Control Panel it still remains in IE and firefox and you have to take more careful measures to get rid of it. This is essentially a browser hijack. I really don't recommend you installing this version of PowerISO. Can't believe AVG would allow something like this.
